cont.entity_a: The router has issues with gateway-to-gateway VPNs dropping regularly. QuickVPN client and other software for VPN connections are no longer supported. VPN tunnels are easy to set up. VPN connectivity is problematic with frequent disconnections. The router occasionally fails to maintain VPN tunnel information. VPN tunnels between small offices are reliable.
The firmware updates have not resolved the issues.
cont.entity_b: The router supports third-party firmware, enhancing functionality. Firmware updates are available but the router is not compatible with all third-party firmware.

cont.entity_a: The router sometimes requires manual rebooting due to frequent lockups.
cont.entity_b: The router occasionally requires resetting to restore connection.

cont.entity_a: The dual WAN option works sometimes but does not switch between WANs reliably. Dual-WAN capability is useful but has a few seconds of downtime during failover.
DHCP occasionally hangs and requires restarts.
It gets hot and needs adequate ventilation.

Installation.comm: The router is easy to set up.

cont.entity_a: The router is easy to configure.
cont.entity_b: Setup is generally easy, with installation completed in under 30 minutes. Setup can be challenging for non-Windows users. Installation can be difficult without technical knowledge. The router's setup is easy but lacks detailed instructions for non-technical users.

cont.entity_a: The router is suitable for smaller installations with less than 250 users.
Port forwarding has limitations, especially with FTP in passive mode. The router fails to redirect incoming connections to different ports.
Load balancing has issues with incoming traffic like FTP. Load balancing works well for web surfing but not with secure connections.
Cisco's technical support is inadequate. Documentation and forums provide useful support.
cont.entity_b: Customer service is helpful for resolving setup issues.

cont.entity_a: The router's performance is inconsistent and can be overburdened with heavy use.
cont.entity_b: The router works seamlessly with a variety of devices and VoIP services. The router handles high download speeds and multiple devices effectively.

cont.entity_a: The router is not recommended for managing VoIP traffic effectively. The router is prone to issues with VoIP systems, randomly closing ports. It is not compatible with some IP phone systems.
cont.entity_b: The router works seamlessly with a variety of devices and VoIP services.
The router has some compatibility issues with PS3 unless directly connected. The router is not recommended for Mac users due to setup difficulties.
The router provides good wireless range and stable connections. The router's signal strength is adequate for a medium-sized house. The router's range is limited compared to newer models.
The router supports multiple security encryption options.
The router is durable and reliable over several years of use.
The router is a good value for its price and performance.

cont.entity_a: The router is outdated and not suitable for modern networking needs.
